title: Russia's war has displaced 10M Ukrainians; Joe Biden will visit Poland this week, White House says: Live Ukraine updates
content:
1. Russia's war has displaced 10M Ukrainians; Joe Biden will visit Poland this week, White House says: Live Ukraine updates  USA TODAY
  2. Russia orders cadets into Ukraine, sends more mercenaries after Zelenskyy: LIVE UPDATES  Fox News
  3. Mariupol terror will go down in history, Ukraine's Zelensky says - BBC News  BBC News
  4. March 20, 2022 Russia-Ukraine news  CNN
  5. Siege of Mariupol is a 'war crime,' says Zelenskiy  Reuters
contentSnippet:

localize.title: ロシアの戦争により10Mのウクライナ人が避難。ジョー・バイデンが今週ポーランドを訪問するとホワイトハウスが発表。ウクライナの最新情報
俄罗斯的战争使1000万乌克兰人流离失所；白宫表示，乔-拜登本周将访问波兰。乌克兰的实时更新
